players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Vote Bob with me."
You: "That's a bold lie, Charlie. I'm the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she's the mafioso. Why are you trying to frame me?"
Diana: "I have no special abilities and cannot confirm either claim, but Charlie and Bob are accusing each other. We should be cautious and not rush to vote until we can find clearer evidence."
Diana: "I don't have any special info, but accusing each other so strongly looks suspicious. Let's watch their behavior closely today and avoid rushing to vote. Maybe one of them will slip up."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows he is mafia. Diana is a villager with no information. Trust me and vote Bob to win."
You: "Charlie is desperate because he knows I'm the real detective. Diana, trust me and vote Charlie - he's the mafioso trying to eliminate me before I can reveal my findings."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
